I'm going to be riding a horse called Little

You're going to be my horse today.
That was actually a really fun ride.

We just finished riding our horses through
the bush and one of my favorite parts was

getting to see Wallabees in the wild just
hopping around while we were passing through

Also, what makes this experience unique is
that at the end of the horseback riding lesson

you get to go swimming with the horses in
the ocean.

That is what a lot of the riders are doing
right now.

If you find yourself on Magnetic Island going
horseback riding is a lot of fun.
